roleset.name: transform
roleset.note: CONVERT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'convert' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. (from convert.01-v predicate notes)
CONVERSION-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'convert'. Vn classes convert-26.6.2-1 and turn-26.6.1-1.Fn class cause_change. Framed by Katie. (from conversion.01-n)

example.name: typically transitive
example.text: Related to that decision, the company said it was converting its Santa Clara, Calif., factory to a research and development facility.
example.arg: to a research and development facility

example.name: explicit start state
example.text: In late September, IBM began shipping a plug-in card that converts its PS/2 model 70-A21 from a 80386 machine to an 80486 machine.

example.name: odd ergative usage
example.text: Convertible capital appreciation bonds with a final stated maturity of Nov. 15, 2014, convert Nov. 15, 1999.
example.arg: Convertible capital appreciation bonds with a final stated maturity of Nov. 15, 2014,

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: The conversion of short-term claims inside the net to long-term loans outside the net.
example.arg: of short-term claims inside the net
to long-term loans outside the net

example.name: All args
example.text: Their publication converstion from traditional format to tabloid format.
